Package Controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
Controller.Controller
public class Controller extends Object
Controller is the master of the game and controls all of the operations executed
Version:
1.0
Author:
csd4623

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Controller()
    constructor: Constructs a new Controller and sets the game as eligible to start .
    postcondition: constructs a new Controller,with 2 new players new board, 4 new card decks, the graphicalUI contructor is called and initialize some boolean variables some int or boolean variables.So,is responsible for creating a new game and initializing it.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    buyer()
    Transformer: If the player has no deal cards nothing happens, else the buyerMode of the CardInventoryUI call is called where the player selects one of his deal cards to sell
    postcondition: The buyerMode of the CardInventoryUI has been called, or nothing has happened (depends if the player has deal cards or not)
    void
    buyerCardSelected​(DealCard selected)
    Transformer: Is called by the CardInventoryUI after a player has selected a deal card to sell, the player is given his money and the sold deal card is added to the removed deal cards deck.
    int
    calculateScoreOfPlayer​(Player p)
    accessor: calculates the score a player and returns it
    Precondition: Player must not be null
    Postcondition: Score of the player has been returned
    void
    crypto()
    Transformer: The Thursday crypto gui popup window is called and if the player plays and wins money is added, if he loses money is subtracted and if he doesn't play or the price remains the same nothing happens
    postcondition: The cryptoPopUp of the gui has been called and the money has been added or subtracted from the player, or nothing has happened if he decides not to buy crypto or the price remains the same
    DealCard
    drawDealCard()
    Transformer: Draws a deal card from the deck, calls the gui to show the card that was drawn to the players and then if the player decides to buy it the card is returned, else it is added to the removed deal cards deck and null is returned
    postcondition: The deal card has been drawn, shown to the players and the player decides what to do with the card.
    String[]
    drawMailCard()
    Transformer: Draws a mail card from the deck, calls the gui to show the card that was drawn to the players and then returns its type and value
    postcondition: The mail card has been drawn, shown to the players, has been added to the removed mail cards deck, and its type and value has been returned
    String
    family()
    Transformer: The family gui popup window is called and the is either given or taken from the player, depending on his previous dice roll
    postcondition: The familyPopUp of the gui has been called and the money has been added or subtracted from the player
    Boolean
    getGameFinished()
    Observer:Return true if a game(both players completed all months) has finished, false otherwise
    Postcondition: return true if a game(both players completed all months) has finished, false otherwise
    Jackpot
    getJackpot()
    accessor: returns the jackpot
    Postcondition: The jackpot has been returned
    String
    lottery()
    Transformer: The lottery gui popup window is called and the money of whoever wins is added to his money
    postcondition: The lotteryPopUp of the gui has been called and the money has been added to the winner
    String
    movePlayerToDealerBuyer​(Player p)
    Transformer: The player is moved to the nearest dealer or buyer tile, and the gui is called to move the pawn
    postcondition: The has been moved to the nearest dealer or buyer tile, and the position of the pawn in the gui board has changed accordingly
    String
    payday()
    Transformer: The payday gui popup window is called, the player receives 3500$ as a salary, he pays his bills and loan interest, he can pay off his loans or part of them and all his cards are removed.
    String
    radio()
    Transformer: The radio gui popup window is called and the money of whoever wins is added to his money
    postcondition: The radioPopUp of the gui has been called and the money has been added to the winner
    void
    sundayMatch()
    Transformer: The sunday match gui popup window is called and if the player plays and wins money is added, if he loses money is subtracted and if he doesn't play nothing happens
    postcondition: The sundayPopUp of the gui has been called and the money has been added or subtracted from the player
    String
    sweepstakes()
    Transformer: The sweepstakes gui popup window is called and the money that the player wins is added to his money
    postcondition: The sweepstakesPopUp of the gui has been called and the money has been added to the player
    Player
    whoseNotTurn()
    accessor: Returns the player whose turn is not to play
    Precondition: It is only one of the players' turn to play Postcondition: One of the two players or null has been returned
    Player
    whoseTurn()
    accessor: Returns the player whose turn is to play or null if it is no one's turn (game has finished)
    Postcondition: One of the two players or null has been returned
    String
    yardSale()
    Transformer: The yard gui popup window is called, the player pays the amount required and a deal card is given to him
    postcondition: The yardPopUp of the gui has been called, the money has been subtracted from the player and a deal card has been added to his inventory

  • Method Details

    • drawMailCard

      public String[] drawMailCard()
      Transformer: Draws a mail card from the deck, calls the gui to show the card that was drawn to the players and then returns its type and value
      postcondition: The mail card has been drawn, shown to the players, has been added to the removed mail cards deck, and its type and value has been returned
      Returns:
      type and value of the card

    • drawDealCard

      public DealCard drawDealCard()
      Transformer: Draws a deal card from the deck, calls the gui to show the card that was drawn to the players and then if the player decides to buy it the card is returned, else it is added to the removed deal cards deck and null is returned
      postcondition: The deal card has been drawn, shown to the players and the player decides what to do with the card. According to the choice either null or the dealCard is returned
      its type and value has been returned
      Returns:
      null or the dealCard

      Parameters:

    • buyerCardSelected

      public void buyerCardSelected​(DealCard selected)
      Transformer: Is called by the CardInventoryUI after a player has selected a deal card to sell, the player is given his money and the sold deal card is added to the removed deal cards deck. The player data of the gui is refreshed and the text of the output panel of the gui is changed to contain the most recent info
      postcondition: The player has been given his money, the deal card has been removed from the player and added to the removed deal cards deck, the players' data of the gui has been refreshed and the text of the ouput panel of gui has been changed

    • family

      public String family()
      Transformer: The family gui popup window is called and the is either given or taken from the player, depending on his previous dice roll
      postcondition: The familyPopUp of the gui has been called and the money has been added or subtracted from the player
      Returns:
      A string description of what has happened

    • yardSale

      public String yardSale()
      Transformer: The yard gui popup window is called, the player pays the amount required and a deal card is given to him
      postcondition: The yardPopUp of the gui has been called, the money has been subtracted from the player and a deal card has been added to his inventory
      Returns:
      A string description of what has happened

    • payday

      public String payday()
      Transformer: The payday gui popup window is called, the player receives 3500$ as a salary, he pays his bills and loan interest, he can pay off his loans or part of them and all his cards are removed. If it he completed his last month his win status is set to true and the player stays at the payday tile for the rest of the game, else he is moved back to the start
      postcondition: The payday gui popup window has been called, the player has received 3500$ as a salary, he has payed his bills and loan interest, he has payed off his loans or part of them and all his cards have been removed. If it he has completed his last month his win status has been set to true and the player stays at the payday tile for the rest of the game, else he has been moved back to the start
      Returns:
      A string description of what has happened

    • sundayMatch

      public void sundayMatch()
      Transformer: The sunday match gui popup window is called and if the player plays and wins money is added, if he loses money is subtracted and if he doesn't play nothing happens
      postcondition: The sundayPopUp of the gui has been called and the money has been added or subtracted from the player

    • crypto

      public void crypto()
      Transformer: The Thursday crypto gui popup window is called and if the player plays and wins money is added, if he loses money is subtracted and if he doesn't play or the price remains the same nothing happens
      postcondition: The cryptoPopUp of the gui has been called and the money has been added or subtracted from the player, or nothing has happened if he decides not to buy crypto or the price remains the same
